about_the_game:
Play as Fawn on her quest to become a Hero so that she can impress and seduce the world's heroes. Use your whip to take down foes, glide past enemy attacks, and transform to explore the world to it's fullest.

Your mission is to become a hero yourself to prove your worth and impress the other heroes of the world. Along the way meet a colorful cast of monsters and lure them in with your power of transformation and seduction. Fawn's taste for heroes must be satisfied, and to impress the other heroes of the world with her many talents.

- 5 transformations for Fawn to take hold of and shape her sexy body
- A giant metroidvania style map with hours of exploration and content
- 4 heroes to meet and romance. As well as 2 non-heroes who can join the harem!
- Relationship Progression that ties in as the story unfolds!
- Unlockable sexy moments that you will return to many times!

Will you adventure forth as a sexy Succubus on an action adventure side scrolling love letter to retro gaming?

content_descriptors.notes:
Succuquest is an erotic platformer with explicit sexual content that is only intended for adults!
The game includes 2D fantasy representation of the following sexual themes:

Non-consensual sex, energy drain through sex, mind control, sex with multiple partners, sex with non human fantasy species (demons, imps, etc.)

The game contains mild horroristic elements, sudden loud sound effects, sudden screen flashes.

All characters are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: x64 compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
